website_summaries.verdict: If you don't mind feeling a bit toasty at night, this mattress pad is an optimal choice for its durability and comfort.
pros: Earns rave reviews for its extra depth, which easily accommodates larger mattresses without sliding around
cons: This mattress pad tends to get quite warm at night due to its overstuffed goose down alternative

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed in this "new" product
customer_reviews.text: Poor stitching in many spots and none in some so upset this was needed for a guest
customer_reviews.author: Joy Abbitt

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I washed the mattress topper for the first time today, and it fell apart in the washer. Mind you, I have the largest capacity washer that you can buy right now, and it doesn't have an agitator in it. I loved the mattress topper, but didn't realize how cheap it was until today. I'm very upset, the return window has closed and now I'm out the money I spent. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it. At first I didn't think it would fit my bed but then when I stretched it out, it works actually perfect. I never had a mattress pad and this feels very great. My bed was okay to sleep on anyways but then after putting it on, it felt better. I even laid on my roommates bed to feel the difference and you can totally feel the difference. It was worth the money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Lofty- Great for college.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Hospitality mattress pad. The first is at college with my son, and has held up (after frequent washings) for two years so far. It is very lofty but the twin XL fits easily into a front loading washer. My son said it is really comfortable. The only negative is that the bottom liner under the pad is thin and can rip easily if you aren’t careful when washing and drying. I did have to make a small repair to the liner and it has been fine ever since. I have recommended this mattress cover to many college students and haven’t heard any complaints. A great purchase and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Koenig

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this mattress pad 3 times now. One for my sons bed, one for our vacation home and now for our primary home. We prefer a firm bed but recently it has seemed a little too firm for both of us. We always talk about how comfortable our vacation bed is which is a cheaper mattress but has this topper. I decided to purchase for the firm bed and it’s just the right amount of softness and comfort. The price is fantastic too. We have a king bed and I change the sheets once a week. I rotate the mattress pad a quarter turn at each changing to make sure it wears more evenly. I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Anioki

customer_reviews.title: Huge improvement for memory foam mattresses
customer_reviews.text: At the advice of the salesperson in the furniture store, I bought memory foam mattresses for my kids. They said that many parents got memory foam because kids can't jump on the mattress, but I've now learned that they're just not soft and cozy like a regular mattress. My kids were complaining about them, but before I went out and bought new mattresses, I got these to see if they'd help, and they've saved the day! Their mattresses are so soft and comfortable now. Lesson learned about memory foam mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: A G

customer_reviews.title: You can’t get this level of sleeping comfort elsewhere for anywhere near this price, 5/5!
customer_reviews.text: After sleeping in a hotel bed that had a mattress topper like this one, I thought I should get one for home. Reviewed a lot of different types even, and decided on this one. It’s made a huge difference in my sleep pattern, and I feel much more fresh in the morning. Then I had surgery on my back and neck, and was worried about not getting any sleep at all because of scar tenderness. Amazingly, this topper had me sleeping like a baby. After several weeks of use, it has not gone flat or had the filling shift. Just as good as the first day. 5/5 in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Business owner

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I've ever been as pleased with a purchase as I am with this. It is SO comfortable - like lying on clouds. The only downside is that I really don't want to get out of bed in the morning. I washed/dried it in my home washer and dryer before putting it on the bed and there were no problems, so it seems like it will be easy to care for.
customer_reviews.author: Teach

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but not quite as thick as I ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it, but not quite as thick as I would have wanted it. Measures maybe like 1-2 inches while fluffed, and then flattens when you lay on it, as you would expect with down alternative. I feel like it doesn't add much to the bed, but there is a little extra cushion. Due to the quilted look, it makes a quilted pattern on my sheets when you lay down on it too. Not that big of a deal. It comes in a little vacuum compressed package inside of the pictured little baggie. Once you cut it open it makes a hissing inflating noise and comes out to its full size. Overall okay purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Nice thickness--not too soft
customer_reviews.text: Nice thickness--not too soft. We bought a firm mattress that felt like I was sleeping on cement. I woke up the first morning in tears that we spent so much on a mattress that was so uncomfortable! Not to worry, this topper is perfect. We live in a tropical climate and it doesn't create heat, which is key in a topper. Washes well, allowed it to air dry. It's not waterproof, but thick enough to keep light spills from ruining mattress (I have a newborn and have put this to the test). Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth Buying!
customer_reviews.text: This wasn't terribly bulky so I wasn't sure it would be comfortable enough. But it's very soft and supportive, without being lumpy. It's so comfortable I had a cat curl up on it just minutes after putting it on the bed. I may well buy a second one for the other bed one day.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Holt

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I am using this in an unconventional way. My mother is in a hospital bed in my living room from a fall. I need to sleep on the couch to be available to her during the night if she needs. After months of this, I was getting a back-ache. I could not find anything like a mattress pad sized for a couch, but I found this and read someone's question that it folds like a comforter, so I thought it would work - even though it is wider than the couch, it just hangs over the edge like a comforter. No back aches. It is great!
customer_reviews.author: Deidra Toney

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and fit
customer_reviews.text: Have owned this mattress pad about 2 weeks .. it is awesome ! Just like settling onto a cloud when you lie down . We have just gotten a new mattress but a bit too firm for my husband . This pad adds about 2” of cushioning . No bunching ,sliding of pad at all during this time . Fits like a fitted sheet on my 14” mattress. I love it !
customer_reviews.author: L.K.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort to the MAX!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I both have the normal back aches and they seemed to be getting worse with our 4 inch memory foam. I travel alot for work and stay in many hotels. I found when I was away from home and sleeping on different mattress pads I did not wake up with any back issues. I purchased this and we both LOVE it!!! I wash our sheets weekly and while the sheets are off I simply fluff the feathers up and it's like brand new every week!!! It's a must try if your not happy with your memory foam anymore!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Literally the best mattress cover.
customer_reviews.text: These arey favorite mattress covers. They are cool and fluffy. I've bought several (Queen and King size) and keep one as a backup due to a temperamental kitty. The King size does puff up a lot. It fits best in a extra large washer & dryer. Queen size is easier to clean. This is not a waterproof cover - it's built for comfort not for liquids.
customer_reviews.author: LittleNitroBunny

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to make my sleeping experience more comfortable so I decided to purchase one for my queen bed. It's extremely soft and fluffy even under my mattress protector and fitted sheet. It did have a chemical smell when I first opened it so I had to wash it first (it's also stated in the instruction that it should be washed prior to use). The only problem I have with it is it doesn't fit perfectly. It lacks an extra 1 or 2 inches on the sides which bothers me, but overall this isn't enough of a problem for me to remove a star. My bed feels a lot cozier now.
customer_reviews.author: M Edward

customer_reviews.title: Like sleeping on a cloud!
customer_reviews.text: My husband was skeptical about this product and thought it was a waste of money...until he got into bed the first night. We had stayed in a hotel with a similar pillow top pad and I knew as soon as we got home that I needed one of my own! I haven't washed it yet because it's a king size and it won't fit into our washing machine (even though it's a high capacity), so it is an inconvenience that I'll have to take it somewhere to have it washed. However, if you want plush and fluffy it's going to be bulky, so I'm not surprised that it's too large to fit into the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Purchased Twice it was so nice!  One King and Two Twin XL for Split King
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this Mattress Pad. We had a king size bed and just LOVED this mattress cover. So comfy, never hot and so easy to wash. Although with a King very bulky in washer because it is so great and fluffy. I bought a Split King Serta iComfort with adjustable bed. The mattress is firm, but I missed the comfy (yes heavenly) mattress pad/cover. I have tried others, but this is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Reliable Pet

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely met my expectations. I have had a problem with hips hurting when I sleep on my side, and I always sleep on my side........since using this no more pain. I had seen a few other people state that it helped their hip pain, and this was my hope. Great product....just enough cushioning, and after 3 weeks of use it hasn't "flattened" at all. Going to get another for my mother who is 80 years old and also has sore hips!
customer_reviews.author: angela asplund

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace an old memory foam mattress topper. My old topper was annoying, as there was no support on the edges, so sitting on the mattress edge felt uncomfortable. It also trapped body heat like crazy. This mattress pad fixes all of these problems. It is plush and breathes very well. It never feels stuffy sleeping on this. The mattress pad has something that goes under the mattress like a fitted sheet to ensure it does not slip off. The packaging was also compact and good. Overall, I have no complaints about this mattress pad.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson M

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable and easily fit to mattress.
customer_reviews.text: Even though I've purchased other mattress pads, I was a bit skeptical about this brand. Once I fitted it to my mattress it fit like a glove. The form fitting corners and the fitted cushion doesn't shift around during my sleep. I am waking up everyday well rested, waking up the way I fell asleep. I highly recommend this brand of mattress pad for anyone who wants a guaranteed good nights sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lynch

customer_reviews.title: WAY TOO HOT.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because our mattress is too firm and makes my back stiff. Figured this would soften it a little bit, but it was WAY too hot and also too soft. I ended up having back pain in my lower back.. I rather deal with stiffness for the first few minutes I wake up then lower back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: When I first brought it it was very nice and fluffy but after awhile it flattened out and there's almost no point of having it on the bed with that being said I am a plus size person so if you are an average size person that it may be okay for you but I can't speak on that on the plus side the mattress pad does stay attached to your mattress so that's a good thing
customer_reviews.author: Emma Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Heaven!
customer_reviews.text: I had forgotten I purchased this until my kid spilled a gallon of water on my bed and I had to remove it. Hat night, I wasn’t able to sleep very well. I woke up with aches and pains. I put the topper back on my mattress after it dried, and I was in HEAVEN! It is so luxurious! You can’t go wrong with this.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable to sleep on, but VERY hot
customer_reviews.text: Very warm to sleep on, but also very comfortable. 3/25/2015 Edited to Add: We put this on our new temperpedic style mattress. I had heard how hot they could be so we were not surprised when we were very warm (read - way too hot). When we took this mattress pad off for washing and replaced it with another, the too hot problem was gone. I actually needed to put another blanket on the bed last night because I was a bit chilly. So, if you are ALWAYS cold, this may be the perfect mattress pad for you. If you are generally comfortable or always warm, this might make for a sweaty night's sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Crackers

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Heavenly!
customer_reviews.text: This is so incredibly comfortable! I purchased this to make my bed a bit more comfier and have a much cozier feeling bed. After shopping Amazon, I found this one. I am so pleased that I purchased this. It fits perfectly and is true to size. It fits on your bed like a fitted sheet, so you have no worry about it sliding off, or having to deal with straps. I put this on my bed, then put my fitted sheet over it. That night when I laid down, I felt like I was sleeping on clouds! This is SOOO soft! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Love this mattress pad!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this mattress pad to put over our Temperpedic mattress which is very comfortable all on its own. The mattress pad is so soft and makes you feel like you are sleeping on a soft pillow. I washed it right away and it washed up nicely. I have not had the pad long enough to comment on its durability but based on the material and the way it is made I do not expect any issues. My husband and I both love sleeping on it Very good price and great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Faye L Seramur

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress Cover
customer_reviews.text: I have a queen size hospitology mattress cover which I love, so I bought this twin one for my daughter’s bed. The quality and comfort are exactly the same for the twin cover as for the queen size cover I own. I bought the queen one because my mattress was way too firm and this helped significantly. My daughter said it feels like she is sleeping on a cloud. I have washed these several times without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, thin and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Eastern King mattress pad and it fits perfectly (keep in mind when ordering, Cal-King is different than King/Eastern King). The padding is thin and soft but don't let that fool you! This is very comfortable and helped with my achy back. Having an adjustable bed, I thought THAT was the answer but apparently not. This topper is just what I needed and a proper remedy to a good sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Nia

customer_reviews.title: not too comfortable mattress. It is dreamy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's very thin, not too comfortable mattress. It is dreamy! Soft, fluffy, easy to clean and dry. It makes a really nice, soft layer on top of the mattress. We used to be able to feel the springs sometimes, but now we don't. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Puffy but no support!
customer_reviews.text: Looked great, very puffy, slept on it one night, no puffiness, body hurt all over! Smh. I visited a family member and it felt like I was sleeping on gel, asked her what the pad was and she shared this item. Ordered it immediately! Returned it, unable to fit it back in plastic bag, very big!
customer_reviews.author: Faye  Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Truly a Pillow-Top
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews, but I am for this product because I really didn't expect this mattress topper to be anything more than a pad. I read many reviews on it and decided to take a chance. We are in a 3-month beach rental. The mattress is very firm. I have trochanter (hip) bursitis on both sides. The mattress hurt. Surprisingly, the Hospitology topper does actually make the mattress feel like a pillow-top. It provides just enough pillow to soothe my hips. It does not mash down, either. I couldn't be more pleased with the topper AND the price!
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Transformed our hard bed
customer_reviews.text: My husband complained about our mattress being to hard. It is only a year old so I bought this topper and it transformed the bed! Super comfortable and thick. Just what we needed. The instructions say you can machine wash it, but I don’t think a home washing machine could handle the bulk. Most likely need to dry clean or take it to a self serve laundromat with big machines.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Traded my side for tempurpedic and it was better but still hurt my lower back
customer_reviews.text: It's still new but it has worked out well. Hubby and I got new cal king split beds. Came with sealy postrapedic mattresses which was too soft for me made my back hurt because I sunk in. Traded my side for tempurpedic and it was better but still hurt my lower back. Placed this mattress pad over it and it's perfect now. Really wished we would of waited on the new mattresses and looked around more but this pad made it work.
customer_reviews.author: your new you

customer_reviews.title: Ready for Sleep!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't be more delighted. 1. No gassing smells and that's huge for me. 2. Hotel quality. 3. Ready for bed! This is so nice and cool!! We have a HOT Tempurpedic and have tried various covers and pads that only seemed to heat it up more! This has cooled down the bed. It's not as fluffy as some have said on my Tempurpedic, but it totally takes away those pressure points that wake me up and the sweating I was doing on our bed. I've been sleeping like a dream on this pad.
customer_reviews.author: Debra T

customer_reviews.title: Really, really impressed with this cover - and so are others who've slept on the bed in our rental.
customer_reviews.text: We've purchased 4 of these, two for our own beds, one for a condo we own - and then one for the spare bed at my daughters. These are incredibly comfortable mattress pads, that make any bed more comfortable. The condo that we own was on VRBO for a while, and we actually had three separate guests ask for the link to order one for their own home after they enjoyed the mattress while they stayed there.
customer_reviews.author: Just wanting stuff that works!

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress pad
customer_reviews.text: This mattress pad has been my favorite of all the ones I've bought. I've bought 2 other types from amazon but this is by far the best in terms of quality, softness and feeling like you're sleeping on clouds. I bought my 1st one which was queen size, and then I recently bought the twin size which made the bed so much more comfortable. It's good to be placed on firmer beds b/c some beds take some time to break in but you don't want to buy a softer mattress either b/c the material will degrade over time. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gugu-gaga

customer_reviews.title: O. M. Goddess
customer_reviews.text: I would not have believed the comfort of this. I have a Purple mattress, which is sort of medium-firm, and my back actually STARTED hurting and it hadn't before. So I thought what the heck, ordered this, and I'm shocked and how nice it feels - fluffy enough, but not "foamy." I'm a very satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: The Lizzie Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Great For Side Sleepers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a foam mattress that has given me some hip pain because it's a little firm and I'm a side sleeper. I decided to give this topper a try based on the reviews. The first night I used it I slept through the night and woke up with no pain. Obviously, I can't speak to its longevity or how it will hold up as I've literally owned it for one night, but I'm so thrilled I slept through the night for the first time in months and woke up without feeling like someone hit me in the hip with a baseball bat!
customer_reviews.author: J. Kinzel

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product. We have purchased 4 twin XL, 1 full, 2 queen and 1 king Hospitality mattress topper over the past 5 years and have loved them all! We originally purchased Hospitology mattress toppers for our daughters when they went to college to help make the dorm mattresses more comfortable. They loved them so much that they begged to have the toppers put on their beds at home. Now that they have graduated from college, they have the Hospitology toppers on their new beds in their apartments.
customer_reviews.author: customer 104

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! My son’s mattress was terribly uncomfortable and you could feel all of the springs on your back. We thought we were going to have to spend a few hundred dollars on a new mattress for him but we decided to try this instead. What a difference! Now his bed is so soft and comfortable and it saved us a lot of money!
customer_reviews.author: Viebie's fan club

customer_reviews.title: Great for extra comfort!
customer_reviews.text: I did my research on the toppers for quite some time and I was pretty skeptical about most of them. I bought this with not alot of confidence that it would be worth having. When this arrived and I put it on my bed I was pleasantly surprised of the quality of this topper. It fit wonderfully. The fabric is finely made. It really seems like something that will last and provide quite a bit of extra softness. It doesn't move and slide down, and the overfilled squares are still big chunky and soft. I also love that this is machine washable.
customer_reviews.author: krystal

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME MATTRESS PAD!!!
customer_reviews.text: This. Is. WITHOUTADOUBTTHEBESTMATTRESSPADEVER. Love this -- very, soft, fits great, puffy, but puffy in a good way. Not too puffy. It makes your bed feel so much more comfortable. Not one complaint. Worth every penny. You'll never want to get out of bed.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Venette

customer_reviews.title: Obscenely comfortable, however it does trap heat pretty bad
customer_reviews.text: Obscenely comfortable, however it does trap heat pretty bad. Solved this by just using a sheet instead of my duvet. Really saved my old mattress. A bit difficult to fit in the washing machine and I'm afraid it'll get damaged every time. Tumble dry on ultra-low heat for as little as possible - let's be real, no one is going to hand wash this and let it air dry. I highly recommend it to all of my friends and family, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: J.R.

customer_reviews.title: Fluffy & Lovey! Buy Cal King for King bed
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! It was vacuum sealed and fluffed out good. Looks nice so far and adds a little cushion which is exactly what I was looking for. I can see this only lasting about a year or two but I'm okay with that! The price was right. I have a king bed and got a California king and it fits perfect! If you have a king definitely order the California King. I did an annoying amount of research before deciding on this one. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: EMC1013

customer_reviews.title: I thought my topper was fine, until I happened to sleep in the guestroom ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a well reviewed and slightly more expensive topperon my own bed, but "cheaped out" with this version for the guestroom. I thought my topper was fine, until I happened to sleep in the guestroom for a few nights this summer - as soon as I was back in my bed, I came to replace my topper with this one. It is incredibly comfortable, soft and cushiony, and transformed an extremely firm mattress into one of the comfiest beds I've ever slept in - while still giving the benefit of a firm mattress. I did not find it too warm, and had no problem with smell.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Meg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a good night's sleep! So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter and she absolutely loves it! She's in college and it's helped her sleep great. I am going to get one for myself :) *Edited January 6, 2017 We have purchased a few more of these. They are great! Also, my daughter's roommates have each purchased one. I know the beds in student housing aren't the best so this has made a world of difference. When my daughter was home for Christmas, she said that she actually missed her dorm bed! My son is leaving for school tomorrow and we are sending one along with him for his dorm bed as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Believe the hype!
customer_reviews.text: There is a lot of hype surrounding this mattress pad. You should believe all of it. My mattress is so hard that it feels as though I've had a full body workout every morning when I wake up. My back and hips always hurt. I've had this mattress pad on my bed for about a week and I haven't been disappointed. No pain at all when I wake up. I am so happy I made the decision to buy this mattress pad.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Because it is such a great price we decided to buy two
customer_reviews.text: Because it is such a great price we decided to buy two, one for the guest bed and one for our son that is hardly here anymore, but we will use his bedroom for various reasons. We could not believe how much more comfortable those beds are now compared to before the topper was put in place. It was hard to believe the difference. When our son came by to watch the house/pets one night he thought we had changed the mattress. This is a great topper for a great price. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: lou

customer_reviews.title: I was actually amazed at how much softer this made our bed
customer_reviews.text: I was actually amazed at how much softer this made our bed. It's only about an inch think and is quilted to keep the filling from moving around (which is really nice and makes sure that you dont get any bunching). I have a 2 inch micro fiber pad underneath it that just didnt make the bed soft enough (it was a really hard mattress), this pad wraps around the 2 inch pad and still easily has room to wrap around the bed. You wont be disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shameless

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING Mattress Pad!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I absolutely love our new king size mattress pad. As soon as I opened the package it popped open and began to expand...I left it on the bed for a few hours to ensure it was aired out and expanded to its full capacity before I put on the sheets and the comforter. We already had a 10 inch long size memory foam mattress, but we were looking for something to add an extra touch of softness. This mattress pad is exactly what we were looking for! It definitely has made a huge difference and I would definitely recommend!!! (I was not paid or compensated in any way for this review)
customer_reviews.author: TA

customer_reviews.title: Relatively inexpensive for the product category - and within 3 days I was sleeping like a baby
customer_reviews.text: My family and I ended up living in our camper for 2 months in-between buying and selling houses - after the first week - something HAD to be done --- so a little Saturday morning surfing netted me this beauty. Relatively inexpensive for the product category - and within 3 days I was sleeping like a baby. Our spring laden camper mattress with an extra egg crate foam mattress got covered by this mattress cover and it was like an entirely new bed. I was REALLY impressed. If you're debating - I'll tell you this -- I'm planning on ordering them for our beds at home including the guest room -- it's that good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Twin size is great, Queen is just nice!
customer_reviews.text: Accidently ordered a size Twin when I needed a Queen... Lucky for me that my son has a Twin bed. The Twin is great! Extra plush squares! Cushiony, soft, and comfy. Well made as well. I love it as does my son. My girls want one each for their beds. My Queen one though, nice as it is, the squares aren't nearly as stuffed full as the Twin is. The quality is still nice just wish it were as awesome as the Twin size.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly...indeed!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to freshen my mattress which had flattened over time. I like a firm mattress but missed the soft "top" cushion layer. I purchased this along with a thin (1 inch memory foam) topper. It was actually more comfortable than the original mattress. The quality of this cover is top notch! The material is incredibly soft and fluffy. It reminds me of pure down - without those miserable feathers!!!its also cool to the body which is great for sleeping. I heartily recommend this to anyone interested in a little old fashion creature comfort "spoiling". It's that good!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Romeyd

customer_reviews.title: Cozy sleep -- also great on an air mattress
customer_reviews.text: What a great find. We just got rid of a 4" memory foam topper, only to remember why we needed to put something on top of our mattress in the first place! Enter this mattress pad. Before we got it on our bed we had a guest stay at our place on an air mattress. So we put it on the air mattress for her stay. Seriously, do yourself a favor and get this for your air mattress! Our guest tried the mattress without the pad (not good) and with the pad (fantastic); she raved over her sleep. It's on our bed now (and it's not coming off!) and we couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Freedom Elixir

customer_reviews.title: very pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I've been on a quest lately to find the ideal mattress pad/cover for my brand new bed. Bed is firm, which I need..but needed a little more and didn't want memory foam. I bought one from bb&b then found this one here on amazon..received it yesterday, put it on last night..and I don't want to get up this morning! It's so comfy!
